idea-plugin.name: Smart Git Commit
idea-plugin.description:
Smart Git Commit & History Manager

Enhance your Git workflow with a streamlined commit and history interface.

  • Smart Commit: Batch commit tracked and untracked changes with custom dates.
  • Integrated History: View your repository history with a clean, toggleable daily view.
  • One-Click Push: Quickly jump to the Push dialog directly from your commit history.
  • Modern UI: Hover effects, rounded containers, and real-time resizable panels.

Built for developers who want a faster, more visual way to manage their local repository.
